info.title: generate-document
info.description:
A [process](http://connections/issite/iCAF/SitePages/APIs%20-%20System%20vs%20Process%20vs%20Experience.aspx) layer API.

#### Service Functionality
This service performs two task.
* Generate a document based of generateConfiguration via api.system.documents.
* Archive the generated document based of archiveConfiguration via api.system.archive.

#### Sequence Diagram
![Interaction](http://connections/issite/ews/SiteAssets/api.process.generate-documents-design.png)

#### Known Implementations
* Care+ Review

#### Performance Expectation
Standard SLA applies.

#### Service Capacity Supported
Standard Capacity applies

#### Suggested Test Scenario
TBD

#### Service Availability
Standard Service Availability applies

#### Service Security
HTTPS/SSL
